content.question: The diagram above shows the short-run Phillips curve <math alttext="open parenthesis, S R P C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>(SRPC)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and the long-run Phillips curve <math alttext="open parenthesis, L R P C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>(LRPC)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> for an economy. If the inflation rate is currently 6 percent, which of the following is true about the current unemployment rate?

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
